resources.string: Pick your favourite sport from this tab to participate in various matches & contests.
Choose your preferred match & participate in different contests & enjoy big winnings
Now create your teams even during the LIVE match.
Select your Live Fantasy slots here
Here is the list of contests you can join in the league
Check out leaderboard info, winnings breakup & join your contest
Create your fantasy teams here to enjoy big winnings.
Withdraw your earnings from here after completing KYC.
Verify your profile & bank details for successful withdrawals
Check Your Level here & level-up to earn more rewards.
Upcoming, on-going and completed contest all at one place.
Take a quick glance at all the contest, at one place.
Easy sorting of Contest by winning, teams, winners or entry fee. Set it from lowest to highest or vice-versa.
Choose a well-balanced Playing XI, picking the right players with different roles.
Tap on any player to add in your Team.
Make playing more interesting, add money from here & continue playing.
